content: RUSTFLAGS='-Cremark=all -Cdebuginfo=2' cargo b with latest rustc always prints out note: optimization missed for sdagisel
hm. isn't that what -Cremark=all is supposed to do? Output remarks about optimization passes, such as if one failed?

Jubilee said:

hm. isn't that what -Cremark=all is supposed to do? Output remarks about optimization passes, such as if one failed?

no, -Cllvm-args=-pass-remarks can print out the passes
